short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically close browser tabs based on timeout and search patterns or regular expressions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ultimate Tab Closer helps you remove unwanted tabs from cluttering up your browser. Configure site URL or page title matches with a delay and tabs that match will close automatically! There are even preset rules you can enable for Zoom and Microsoft Teams launch pages.

Features:
- Close tabs that match search patterns or regular expressions after configurable amount of time
  - Rules can be individually enabled or disabled
  - Indicates which rules match for active tab
  - Indicates how many times rule has closed a tab
  - Rules can be full or partial URL or title match
  - Rule priority allows higher priority rules to match first. 1 is highest priority, 2 is lower than that, etc.

- Enable/disable all rules with single checkbox

Predefined rules:
- Add rule to close Zoom meeting launch pages 
- Add rule to close Microsoft Teams meeting launch pages
- Want another preset added? Let me know!

General tab closing features:
- Close tabs to right or left of current tab
- Close all other tabs
